name: Investec Asset Management Limited
goal: Investec Asset Management provides investment products and services to institutions, advisory clients and individuals. Our clients include pension funds, central banks, sovereign wealth funds, insurers, foundations, financial advisers and individual investors.
interests: Banking and financial services, Business and Industry, Consumers, Economy, finance and the euro, Taxation
euInitiatives: Benchmarks, Brexit, CRD V, Cross border distribution, ESAs review, GDPR, MMF Regulation, PRIIPs, Prudential Regime, Sustainable Finance
